definitions.title: n.pr.mont. 1.
definitions.body: mt. on border of Edom, alw. [[הׂר הָהָר]], named as stage in Isr.'s journey to Canaan Nu 20:22, Nu 21:4, Nu 33:37, De 32:50; as place of Aaron's death Nu 20:23, Nu 20:25, Nu 20:27, Nu 33:38, Nu 33:39, Nu 33:41, De 32:50 (all P); = mod. Jebel Nebi Hârûn c. 50 miles S. of Dead Sea, just S. (SW.) of Petra, acc. to Rob:BR ii. 125, 152, cf. 519 ff. Bd:Pal 153; disputed by Ew Kn Di, & esp. Trumbull:Kadesh Barnea 128 ff., who thinks of J. Madurah, NW. of Edom.

definitions.title: 2. a
definitions.body: NE. spur of Lebanon Nu 34:7, Nu 34:8 (P); mod. Jebel Akkar cf. Porter:Damascus, ed. 2, p. 333 Nbr:Geogr. du Talm. p. 9 Furrer:ZPV viii. 27; yet v. Di.
